Introduction.Text: Tomorrow is the restaurant’s grand reopening. I have butterflies in my stomach, I hope everything goes well. I have taken up this business for you, it was your dream for me to inherit it after all.
I know there’s still a lot of work left to do, I’m also aware that it looks nothing like it did before, but I’ll make sure to work hard until it does.
All I want is to make you guys happy, I want to make you two proud.
